title: Disaster Management Education Program Design for Children with Disabilities (K-12)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic concepts in special education and disaster management
context.additional_context: Education linking characteristics of children with disabilities and disaster response strategies for the general public, focusing on developing systematic pedagogical methods applicable in actual school settings

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three core components of a customized disaster management education program for different types of disabilities
Learners can develop educational programs by applying the instructional design process for each phase of the ADDIE model
Learners can propose at least five practical educational strategies to enhance independent disaster response capabilities for children with disabilities
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
